entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is mentioned as the one who will give Harry detention. She is described as having every right to do so because she is Harry's teacher.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the student who is being given detention by Professor Umbridge. He is mentioned as being outraged and telling the truth about Voldemort's return.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is Harry's teacher and is mentioned as having every right to give him detention. She is described as being angry and straightening her glasses.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as knowing that Voldemort has returned.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one who has returned and is causing trouble.
